metadata.description: Comprehensive ticket dataset with various scenarios, priorities, and workflow states

tickets.short_description: Database access for recommendation-engine-v2 to user_profiles DB
tickets.business_justification: ML service requires read-write access to update user preference scores for personalized recommendations

tickets.short_description: Allow external API access to payment-gateway service
tickets.business_justification: Enable Stripe webhook callbacks for payment confirmation notifications per PCI-DSS requirements
tickets.rollback_plan: Disable WAF rule and remove IP whitelist entry

tickets.short_description: VPN access for DevOps team to production Kubernetes cluster
tickets.business_justification: DevOps team requires kubectl access for deployment and troubleshooting of production workloads
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove VPN group from Kubernetes RBAC

tickets.short_description: Enable Transit Gateway routing between Analytics VPC and Data Lake VPC
tickets.business_justification: Analytics platform requires access to data lake for ML model training and real-time analytics pipeline

tickets.short_description: Emergency block of malicious IP range - Active threat detected
tickets.source_system: Malicious IP Range - Known Tor Exit Nodes
tickets.business_justification: Emergency security response to active threat - automated brute force attacks detected
tickets.threat_intelligence_source: Recorded Future Alert RF-2026-0112-001, AlienVault OTX Pulse
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove deny rules from all platforms

tickets.short_description: Temporary vendor access for SAP integration maintenance
tickets.business_justification: Scheduled SAP S/4HANA upgrade requiring vendor specialist support per contract SOW-SAP-2025-089
tickets.rollback_plan: Revoke vendor credentials and remove firewall rule

tickets.short_description: Allow microservices communication for order-processing to inventory-service
tickets.business_justification: New microservice architecture requires inter-service communication for order fulfillment workflow

tickets.short_description: Block deprecated API endpoint access from legacy systems
tickets.business_justification: Deprecating old API version as part of modernization initiative - redirect to new endpoints
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove deny rule and restore API access

tickets.short_description: Enable CloudWatch log streaming to Splunk SIEM
tickets.business_justification: Centralized log aggregation for security monitoring and compliance requirements

tickets.short_description: Allow Redis cluster access from application caching layer
tickets.business_justification: Application requires distributed caching for session management and performance optimization

tickets.short_description: External partner API integration for FedEx shipping provider
tickets.business_justification: Integration with FedEx shipping API for real-time tracking and label generation
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove WAF exception and IP whitelist

tickets.short_description: Database replication between primary and DR site
tickets.business_justification: Enable database replication for disaster recovery compliance - RPO 15 minutes
tickets.rollback_plan: Disable replication and remove firewall rules

tickets.short_description: Allow monitoring agent communication to Datadog
tickets.business_justification: Enable APM and infrastructure monitoring across all environments

tickets.short_description: Block suspicious IP range from Eastern Europe - Threat Response
tickets.business_justification: Threat intelligence indicates active scanning and brute force attempts from this range
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove deny rules when threat cleared

tickets.short_description: Allow CI/CD pipeline access to Artifactory repository
tickets.business_justification: CI/CD pipeline requires access to push and pull build artifacts
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove firewall rule and revoke service account

tickets.short_description: Enable cross-region VPC peering for global load balancing
tickets.business_justification: Global load balancing architecture for improved latency and disaster recovery

tickets.short_description: Allow Kafka cluster access for event streaming
tickets.business_justification: Enable event-driven architecture for real-time data processing
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove Kafka ACLs and security group rules

tickets.short_description: External webhook integration for GitHub Actions
tickets.business_justification: GitHub Actions requires webhook callback for deployment status updates
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove WAF rule and IP whitelist

tickets.short_description: Block crypto mining pool connections
tickets.business_justification: Prevent unauthorized cryptocurrency mining on company resources
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove deny rules and DNS sinkhole entries

tickets.short_description: Allow Elasticsearch cluster access for log analytics
tickets.business_justification: Enable centralized log search and analytics capabilities

tickets.short_description: Enable S3 VPC Endpoint for secure data transfer
tickets.business_justification: Route S3 traffic through VPC endpoint for security and cost optimization
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove VPC endpoint and route table entries

tickets.short_description: Allow Azure AD authentication traffic
tickets.business_justification: Enable Azure AD SSO authentication for corporate applications
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove egress rules for Azure AD endpoints

tickets.short_description: Block outbound DNS to non-corporate resolvers
tickets.business_justification: Enforce use of corporate DNS for security monitoring and DNS tunneling prevention

tickets.short_description: Allow GraphQL API access for mobile applications
tickets.business_justification: New mobile app requires GraphQL API access for data queries

tickets.short_description: Enable MongoDB Atlas peering connection
tickets.business_justification: Migrate to MongoDB Atlas for managed database services

tickets.short_description: Allow Okta SCIM provisioning traffic
tickets.business_justification: Enable automated user provisioning through Okta SCIM
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove WAF rules and IP whitelist

tickets.short_description: Rejected - Overly permissive database access request
tickets.business_justification: Developer needs quick access to debug production issue

approval_history.comments: 0.0.0.0/0 source not allowed for production databases. Use VPN access instead.

tickets.rejection_reason: Overly permissive source CIDR violates security policy

tickets.short_description: Allow Snowflake data warehouse access
tickets.business_justification: Connect analytics tools to Snowflake data warehouse

tickets.short_description: Enable AWS PrivateLink for third-party SaaS
tickets.business_justification: Secure private connectivity to SaaS provider without internet exposure

tickets.short_description: Block TikTok domains for corporate network
tickets.business_justification: Corporate policy prohibits TikTok access due to security concerns
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove DNS and URL filter entries

tickets.short_description: Allow Terraform Cloud API access for IaC deployments
tickets.business_justification: Enable infrastructure as code deployments through Terraform Cloud

tickets.short_description: Enable AWS Systems Manager access for EC2 management
tickets.business_justification: Enable secure SSH-less management of EC2 instances through Systems Manager

tickets.short_description: Cancelled - Duplicate request for Redis access
tickets.business_justification: Application needs Redis access
tickets.cancellation_reason: Duplicate of CHG0012354 - access already granted

tickets.short_description: Allow PagerDuty webhook for incident notifications
tickets.business_justification: Enable PagerDuty to send incident webhooks for automation

tickets.short_description: Enable AWS Secrets Manager access for credential rotation
tickets.business_justification: Implement automated credential rotation for security compliance

tickets.short_description: Block Russia and Belarus IP ranges
tickets.business_justification: Geopolitical risk mitigation - no business operations in these regions

tickets.short_description: Allow Cloudflare WAF to origin servers
tickets.business_justification: Route traffic through Cloudflare for DDoS protection and WAF

tickets.short_description: On Hold - Pending vendor security assessment
tickets.business_justification: New vendor integration for HR system
tickets.hold_reason: Awaiting vendor SOC2 Type II report review

tickets.short_description: Allow Lambda functions to access RDS via VPC
tickets.business_justification: Serverless functions require database access for API backend

tickets.short_description: Enable Azure Event Hub access for log streaming
tickets.business_justification: Stream Azure logs to central logging platform

tickets.short_description: Block known malware C2 domains
tickets.business_justification: Block communication with known malware command and control infrastructure

tickets.short_description: Allow GCP Cloud Functions to access Cloud SQL
tickets.business_justification: Serverless functions need database connectivity

tickets.short_description: Enable Twilio webhook for SMS notifications
tickets.business_justification: Enable Twilio webhooks for SMS status callbacks

tickets.short_description: Allow Prometheus to scrape metrics from all namespaces
tickets.business_justification: Enable comprehensive metrics collection for observability

tickets.short_description: Enable AWS KMS access for encryption key management
tickets.business_justification: Enable encryption key management for data protection compliance

tickets.short_description: Allow SendGrid for transactional email
tickets.business_justification: Enable transactional email delivery through SendGrid

tickets.short_description: Block BitTorrent traffic on corporate network
tickets.business_justification: Block P2P file sharing to prevent copyright infringement and data exfiltration

tickets.short_description: Enable HashiCorp Vault access for secrets management
tickets.business_justification: Enable centralized secrets management for applications

tickets.short_description: Allow Grafana access to Prometheus for dashboards
tickets.business_justification: Enable Grafana dashboards to query Prometheus metrics

tickets.short_description: Enable AWS ALB access logs to S3
tickets.business_justification: Enable ALB access logging for security and compliance

tickets.short_description: Draft - New microservice API access request
tickets.business_justification: New checkout service needs to call payment service APIs

tickets.short_description: Allow Jira webhook for issue tracking integration
tickets.business_justification: Enable Jira webhooks for automated issue tracking

tickets.short_description: Block Zoom for regulated departments
tickets.business_justification: Compliance requirement prohibits certain video conferencing for regulated departments
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove URL filter and DNS block

tickets.short_description: Enable AWS EFS access for shared storage
tickets.business_justification: Enable shared file storage for application cluster

tickets.short_description: Allow New Relic APM agent communication
tickets.business_justification: Enable APM monitoring through New Relic

tickets.short_description: Enable inter-region database replication for DR
tickets.business_justification: Critical DR requirement - cross-region database replication for business continuity
tickets.rollback_plan: Remove TGW peering and replication configuration
